attributes.additional_details: State owned  industry which is properly funded and run has to benefit the whole country. We are more and more reliant on imports and foreign owned businesses which can close factories at the drop of a hat in favour of factories in their own countries.  We once were the second biggest manufacturer in the world and our wealth is being slowly eroded by profits going abroad.  British owned businesses would pay taxes directly to the government and the workers would have security almost guaranteed.
attributes.background: This government needs to establish state owned businesses such as Motor manufacturers,  engineering , shipbuilding  and technology.  Now is the time to rebuild and secure jobs for the masses.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly which industries you would like the Government to nationalise or create new state-owned businesses for. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
